title: Câmara (Alfredo Bettencourt da)
body: He was born in Funchal on April 21, 1857, and for many years, he was a private primary education teacher. He authored 'Gramatica Portuguesa, em harmonia com a reforma ortografica ultimamente publicada' (Portuguese Grammar, in harmony with the recently published spelling reform), Funchal, 1912, 240 pages, and 'Exercícios sobre a conjugação dos verbos regulares e irregulares...' (Exercises on the conjugation of regular and irregular verbs), 10th part, Funchal, 1915, 64 pages, 20th part, Funchal, 1915, 64 pages. He passed away in Funchal on January 26, 1921.

1912: Publication of 'Gramatica Portuguesa, em harmonia com a reforma ortografica ultimamente publicada'
1915: Publication of 'Exercícios sobre a conjugação dos verbos regulares e irregulares'
